description: Scam conversation formatted as voice call transcription with natural speech patterns, filler words, and interruptions. Tests handling of conversational flow.

turns.scammer_message: [Ring ring] Hello? Hello sir? Can you hear me? Yes? Good good. Sir this is... um... this is calling from Microsoft Technical Support Team. Your computer, sir, your computer is having very serious virus problem. Are you... sir are you there?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: hello sir yes i am here... i am pushpa... oh no virus? my son bought this computer for me to talk to my grandson... will it break? pls help me sir what should i do? will i have to pay money for this?

turns.scammer_message: Yes sir yes! I am technical expert, my name is... uh... Rajesh Kumar, employee ID MS2024789. Sir we detected malicious software in your Windows PC. Very dangerous sir! Your banking details, password, everything is at risk! Sir you need to... you need to take immediate action!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: oh my god rajesh sir i am very scared... my pension money is in that bank account... pls tell me what to do i dont know anything about computers... do i have to go to bank or can i pay you here to fix it? what is teh process sir?

turns.scammer_message: Okay okay sir don't panic! I will help you, okay? First thing... first download... uh... download AnyDesk application. A-N-Y-D-E-S-K. You know AnyDesk? It's safe application, all companies use it. I need to see your screen to remove virus. You have computer in front now?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s), 2 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: any desk? what is that beta? like a table? i dont know how to download things... my son says dont click on anything... but if you are from microsoft then okay. how much will it cost to fix? i want to pay you quickly so my bank is safe... do you have a upi id or bank account i can send to?

turns.scammer_message: Very good sir! Now... um... after removing basic virus, I see there is... there is premium malware also installed. This one is... how to say... very advanced hacking software. For this we need to... we need Microsoft Protection Suite. Cost is... let me check... yes Rs.3,999 only.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s), 2 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: 3999 is too much rajesh beta but i will pay if it keeps my bank safe... i am opening my phone now... where do i send teh money? do you have upi id or should i go to bank?

turns.scammer_message: Payment? Yes yes very simple! You can... uh... you can pay through GPay or PhonePe. Just send to my number 9988776655. Or... or UPI ID is... wait I'm checking... yes: techsupport.microsoft@paytm. Very easy sir! Then I immediately activate protection!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 Name(s), 2 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: ok rajesh beta i am typing techsupport.microsoft@paytm in my phonepe... it is asking for a name to confirm... what name will show on teh screen? i am very scared of sending to wrong person pls tell me teh name so i can pay you quickly

turns.scammer_message: Sir if... if payment not going through, you can... you can call my supervisor also. His number is 8877665544. Or... uh... there is online portal also: http://microsoft-tech-india.support. You can pay there with credit card. But sir do fast! Hackers are... they are active right now in your system!
